description: A historically Black community in Memphis is already burdened by pollution. Musk's AI data center could further threaten the environment, locals say.
title: Elon Musk’s New AI Data Center Raises Alarms Over Pollution

description: News of separate teen accounts for those under 18 comes amid growing backlash against how social media affects young people.
title: Instagram Introduces Teen Accounts, Other Sweeping Changes to Boost Child Safety Online

description: The parent company of Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp announced a new ban on RT and other outlets, days after the U.S. sanctioned Russian media entities.
title: Meta Is Globally Banning Russian State Media on Its Apps, Citing ‘Foreign Interference’

description: TIME100 AI honorees Ray Kurzweil, Chinasa T. Okolo, and Elizabeth Kelly, and Cognizant CEO Ravi Kumar S participated in a TIME100 Impact Dinner panel.
title: At TIME100 Impact Dinner, AI Leaders Discuss the Technology’s Transformative Potential

description: TIME100 AI honorees Lisa Su, Amba Kak, and King Willonius offered toasts at a TIME100 Impact Dinner.
title: At TIME100 Impact Dinner, AI Leaders Talk Reshaping the Future of AI
